name: Mahinga Kai
description:
A game made for the Maori Language Week Game Jame to coincide with Te Wiki o te Reo Māori 2022.

In Mahinga Kai you are in charge of a garden that feeds the seven waka hourua that arrived after Kupe.  Keep them happy by harvesting all of the plants they ask for.

If you get stuck click on the words to see the English translations. 

Instructions;

  • Use the Timo card to prepare the soil.
  • Plant a seed in the soil
  • Click the Te Mutunga Iho button to advance a day.
  • When the plants are grown use the Kaheru card to harvest the plant.
  • The more grown plants that are connected the better harvest you get. So be patient and prepare your garden well. 
  • Good luck and don't forget to scare away any pests.
